conclusion: Analyze the paths of the liquid from points A, B, and C.
The liquid flows from A through the white baffle.
The white baffle directs the liquid downward.
The liquid will flow into container D.
The liquid flows from B through the yellow baffle.
The yellow baffle directs the liquid downward.

The liquid flows from C through the blue baffle.
The blue baffle directs the liquid downward.
The liquid will flow into container F.
Liquid from A will flow into container D.

Liquid from C will flow into container F.
The liquid from A, B, and C will flow into containers D, E, and F, respectively.
